attributes.action: compel Swindon Borough Council to reopen the Groundwell Park and Ride service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Earlier this year Swindon Borough Council closed the Groundwell Park and Ride service.

This has had the effect of increasing traffic congestion, increasing pollution and adversely affecting the lives of those who live, work, trade or shop in Swindon.

I request that the Government take action so as to require Swindon Borough Council to reopen the Park and Ride service for the benefit of the public who live and work in Swindon.

rejection.details: This is a local government issue. Please petition Swindon Borough Council directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
